inputFields.name: groupStatus
inputFields.description: Filters memberships based on group status

inputFields.name: guestEventHosted
inputFields.description: Filter memberships down to those where the member was a guest host for an event

inputFields.name: leaderSubset
inputFields.description: When status is provided includes LEADER, leaderSubset indicates a subset of the LEADER status to be returned

inputFields.name: status
inputFields.description: Filters memberships based on membership status
